com.garmin.health

Interface DevicePairedStateListener


  • public interface DevicePairedStateListener
    Provides callbacks to be notified when device are paired or unpaired
    See Also:
    AbstractDeviceManager.addPairedStateListener(com.garmin.health.DevicePairedStateListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAuthRequested(Device device, AuthCompletion completion)
      Called when a Device needs a passkey to re-establish a connection.
      void onDevicePaired(Device device)
      Called when the device has successfully paired and is ready to communicate.
      default void onDeviceSetupComplete(Device device)
      Called when all post-pair setup has been completed and all feature requests are available.
      void onDeviceUnpaired(String macAddress)
      Called when the device was forgotten and no longer paired.
      default void onServiceDisconnected()
      Called when the Garmin Health service has been severed.

    • Method Detail

      • onDevicePaired

        void onDevicePaired(Device device)
        Called when the device has successfully paired and is ready to communicate.
        Parameters:
        device - the device that paired
        See Also:
        DeviceManager.pair(ScannedDevice, PairingCallback)

      • onDeviceSetupComplete

        default void onDeviceSetupComplete(Device device)
        Called when all post-pair setup has been completed and all feature requests are available.
        Parameters:
        device - the device that paired
        See Also:
        DeviceManager.pair(ScannedDevice, PairingCallback)

      • onDeviceUnpaired

        void onDeviceUnpaired(String macAddress)
        Called when the device was forgotten and no longer paired.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - the mac address of the device that was unpaired that was unpaired
        See Also:
        AbstractDeviceManager.forget(String)

      • onAuthRequested

        void onAuthRequested(Device device,
                     AuthCompletion completion)
        Called when a Device needs a passkey to re-establish a connection.
        Parameters:
        completion - provides method to return passkey to device

      • onServiceDisconnected

        default void onServiceDisconnected()
        Called when the Garmin Health service has been severed. Further communication should not be attempted until the service has restarted and been rebound. This method will not be called unless the Health SDK is implemented using the service communication. To determine the cause of service failure please review the logs for the process running the Garmin Health service.
